overview: Adam is responsible for the financial reporting of the fund including budget preparation and general ledger management. In addition to his operational responsibilities, Adam participates actively in evaluating potential investments. Furthermore, he assists portfolio companies by performing general control reviews on an as needed basis. Adam joined Comcast in 1996 in the Internal Audit department as a Senior Associate. In this capacity he gained experience in all divisions of the company. Adam assisted in the planning and completion of internal reviews with the goal of providing meaningful real-time feedback to company management. Prior to joining Comcast, Adam was a Senior Associate with Coopers & Lybrand (now PriceWaterhouseCoopers). Adam is a Certified Public Accountant and holds a Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Drexel University. Adam serves as a Board Observer at Tripwire.
